attributes.review: This app smelled like cheetos through the screen. I could see a big racist Cheeto when I downloaded it and I have childhood trauma now. This app would be better off deleted so no one else gets childhood drama. Anyways byeee!
attributes.title: Horrible app.

attributes.review:
Worst experience ever. 
Can’t understand how this was even released. It’s making my mind on how to vote because if this is so bad, how is it possible that he is the president. He can’t even have a good app. 🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: Terrible app !!!! Run away !!!

attributes.review: This app took 2-3 days to download and it was very laggy and I tried to use it and it just shut down... what a disappointment because I want my very loving president to have the best of everything 😘❤️❤️
attributes.title: Piece of s*it

attributes.review: Trump 2020 all the way!! However this app doesn’t truly convey the power that my president Donald Trump exudes. The app gave me at LEAST 4 viruses. And my phone shut down. Come on! Google needs to get this app down for the safety of my fellow ‘mericans. App is trash.
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever used, and I’ve used more apps than anyone I know. No one has used more apps than me.  So many apps. This one is the WORST one. Slow downloading process, not user friendly. Terrible.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: First of all this app made my phone die very easily like my phone was at 80%  then 2 minute later it was at 10% I don’t like that 💔second of all I’m going to marry Barron and you will not expect it 😍🙈
attributes.title: Help me ✨🧚✨

attributes.review: i was hoping to download this app to keep up w my non racist loving president, not only did it take since NOVEMBER 2018 to JULY 2020 to download, as soon as i opened it SOME LADY CAME THROUGH THE SCREEN AND PULLED MY HAIR!!!! AND THREATENED TO KIDNAP MY SON IF I DIDNT VOTE FOR TRUMP !!!! YES! SHE PULLED MY HAIR! i am beyond disappointed w this TRUMP! horrible app. only pictures of a cheeto with a wig come up!
attributes.title: pulled my hair !

attributes.title: THIS APP IS TRASH!!

attributes.review: I’m not part of the whole remove the app but this is just outrageous I wanted to see what we’re the plans for trump 2020 and I hated it DONT download the app it’s a waste of space and has nothing good to do with anything
